data.text: @OmarAlghabra @Chris_Bittle @VBadawey Remove all testing requirements from the border and allow businesses to recover!
@OmarAlghabra @Chris_Bittle @VBadawey Is there an election coming sooner than later?

@ChadComartin @BrinkoftheWorld @OmarAlghabra @Chris_Bittle @VBadawey @Irek_K @jyduclos @marcomendicino @manvirshokar @JustinTrudeau @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth Exciting ✅ join the chat and thank me later 👇

https://t.co/4xiaYslDBb

@HVallence @OmarAlghabra @Chris_Bittle @VBadawey They don’t care…that is the root of the issue. They love to say they do (“we have your backs”) but they only do if convenient. @jyduclos @marcomendicino @Irek_K @manvirshokar @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth @JustinTrudeau

@BrinkoftheWorld @OmarAlghabra @Chris_Bittle @VBadawey @Irek_K Don’t expect much from this group of representatives. They have little concern for border families. Trust me, I know. @jyduclos @marcomendicino @manvirshokar @JustinTrudeau @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth
@OmarAlghabra @Chris_Bittle @VBadawey And the impacts of the ongoing “blockades” for cross border families?@jyduclos @marcomendicino @JustinTrudeau @Irek_K @manvirshokar @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth

@OmarAlghabra @Chris_Bittle @VBadawey Where is the announcement regarding scrapping testing for short trips? You can mingle with thousands of unvaxxed people in a stadium- but the vaxxed person crossing the border to see their parents is the problem? We need to adapt better. @Irek_K
